application_credentials.description:
Follow the [instructions]({more_info_url}) for [OAuth consent screen]({oauth_consent_url}) to give Home Assistant access to your Google Tasks. You also need to create Application Credentials linked to your account:
1. Go to [Credentials]({oauth_creds_url}) and click **Create Credentials**.
1. From the drop-down list select **OAuth client ID**.
1. Select **Web application** for the Application Type.

abort.access_not_configured:
Unable to access the Google API:

{message}
abort.wrong_account: Wrong account: Please authenticate with the right account.
